o jogo é muito bom! CS é jogo que esta na historia dos games a varios anos e sempre vem melhorando, só que recentimento algumas coisas vem deixando o jogo um pouco chato que são pessoas que joga trolando ou chigando... dando rage e etc, pessoas como de outros paises, principalmente os players que chamamos de "boludos", mas fora isso o jogo é otimo

Le seul problème, c'est les russes 

https://youtu.be/QDEA2EnzbI0

Insupportable, le jeu me dégoûte. 

Toujours un plaisir de commencer ça partie avec des doux mots russe comme "тут русские есть?" qui veux dire "il y a des russes?" et même en leur disent de parler en anglais il nous kick ou nous disent bien sur "CYKA BLYAT IDINA ROY"

The "yes" recommendation involved with this game comes with a rather large caveat in that the game is no longer being given the proper care or love that the community clearly desires and therefore I believe CS is dying in that sense but overall the game is fun. If you can overcome the initial climb out of the low tier, toxic or crappy ranks the game is enjoyable and the community servers provide something for everyone. It's a shame valve punish people who like to play on these community servers and still in comp with the pure server shenanigans.
this game is trash, i have been playing it for 1400 hours and absolutely hate it its no fun everyone in the game is trash and i cant stop playing it plz help me i want to die
